full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 159 of 261 1320
LC6Cmax5 McHugh - cross
1 Q. Good afternoon, Mr. McHugh.
2 A. Good afternoon.
3 Q. If you see, I've placed a folder of documents near you, but please don't look at those until I direct you to. All right?
4 A. Okay.
5 Q. Okay. Mr. McHugh, you testified that you've been working at JP Morgan bank for 30-odd years; is that right?
6 A. Yes.
7 Q. And you've been an executive director since 2017; is that right?
8 A. I was promoted to executive director a while ago. I don't remember the exact date.
9 Q. Okay. For several years?
10 A. Several years.
11 Q. Okay. And your current responsibilities I think you said are to work with -- you work with the service teams; is that right?
12 A. I support the service teams.
13 Q. Okay. And also the compliance teams?
14 A. I work in partnership with compliance teams. They're part of the second line of defense.
15 Q. I see. So you mainly focus on supporting the client service teams; is that right?
16 A. That's right.
17 Q. And before you became executive director, you, yourself,
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00012910

1 Q. Good afternoon, Mr. McHugh.
2 A. Good afternoon.
3 Q. If you see, I've placed a folder of documents near you, but please don't look at those until I direct you to. All right?
4 A. Okay.
5 Q. Okay. Mr. McHugh, you testified that you've been working at JP Morgan bank for 30-odd years; is that right?
6 A. Yes.
7 Q. And you've been an executive director since 2017; is that right?

16 A. That's right.
17 Q. And before you became executive director, you, yourself,
